document.full_text: militants ambushed a convoy of vehicles carrying members of an anti-taliban shi'ite tribe in a pakistani tribal region on the afghan border on friday, killing eight and wounding five, tribesmen and government officials said.
document.title: militants kill 8 and kidnap dozens in pakistan ambush
lines_and_colors: militants ambushed a convoy of vehicles carrying members of an anti-taliban shi'ite tribe in a pakistani tribal region on the afghan border on friday, killing eight and wounding five, tribesmen and government officials said.
